CareRequestItem.name: CareRequestItem
CareRequestItem.description: Represents the details of a care service request, including name, modifiers, and the effective date. One or more care service requests can be associated with a care request.

ApprovedLengthOfStay.description: The number of days requested for the admission.

ApprovedLevelOfCare.description: Specifies the approved level of care for the patient.

ApprovedQuantity.description: The approved quantity of the care item.

ApprovedServiceEndDate.description: The end date of the approved service that the patient received.

ApprovedServiceStartDate.description: The start date of the approved service that the patient received.

AssertionIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the requested item in the coverage information.

AuthApprovalIdentifier.description: The unique identifier assigned to the item on approval of the authorization request.

AuthorizationRefIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the authorization request associated with the requested item.

CareRequestCaseId.description: Case related to the care request.

CareRequestId.description: Care request for the care request item.

ClinicalDetermination.description: The clinical determination of the care request.

ClinicalDeterminationNotes.description: The notes related to the clinical determination.

ClinicalDeterminationReasonId.description: The reason for the clinical determination.

ClinicalServiceRequestId.description: The clinical service request associated with the care request item.

CodeDescription.description: Description of the denied service code.

CodeTypeIdentifier.description: ID of the code type for the service.

CumulativeLengthOfStay.description: The number of days a patient is admitted.

CurrentLevelOfCare.description: Specifies the level of care the patient is receiving.

DecisionDate.description: The date and time when the last decision was made for this care request item.

DeniedLevelOfCare.description: The level of care denied for the patient.

DeniedQuantity.description: The quantity of the denied service.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

ModifiedCodeDescription.description: Description of the modified service code.

ModifiedCodeIdentifier.description: ID of the code for the modified service.

ModifiedCodeType.description: Code type for the modified service.

ModifiedCodeTypeIdentifier.description: ID of the code type for the modified service.

ModifiedEffectiveDate.description: Effective date for the modified service.

ModifiedEndDate.description: Termination date for the modified service.

ModifiedLevelOfCare.description: Specifies the modified level of care for the patient.

ModifiedModifierDescription.description: Modifier description for modified service code.

ModifiedProcedureCodeId.description: Code for the modified service, drug, or equipment. ModifiedProcedureCodeId will be deprecated in a future release, so use ModifiedProcedureCodeSetId instead.

ModifiedProcedureCodeSetId.description: The code set for the modified service, drug, or device associated with the care request item.

ModifiedQuantity.description: The modified quantity of requested care.

Modifier2Description.description: Description of the second modifier for the service code.

Modifier3Description.description: Description of the third modifier for the service code.

Modifier4Description.description: Description of the fourth modifier for the service code.

ModifierCodeSetId.description: The modifier code set for the service code associated with the care request item.

ModifierDescription.description: Description of the modifier for the service code

Priority.description: The priority of the authorization for the requested item.

ProcedureCodeId.description: Code for the service, drug, or equipment. ProcedureCodeId will be deprecated in a future release, so use ProcedureCodeSetId instead.

ProcedureCodeSetId.description: The code set for the service, drug, or device associated with the care request item.

Quantity.description: The quantity of the item that is requested.

QuantityType.description: Quantity type for the request such as days, units, or visits.

ReasonCodeId.description: The reason for requesting the item.

RequestedLengthOfStay.description: The number of days requested for the admission.

RequestedLevelOfCare.description: Specifies the requested level of care for the patient.

RequestedServiceEndDate.description: The end date of the requested service.

RequestedServiceStartDate.description: The start date of the requested service.

RequiredResponseCount.description: The number of responses required for the requested item.

ResponseDateTime.description: The date and time when the response was sent for the requested item.

ServiceCategory.description: Name of the service type such as medical care, diagnostic radiology, pharmacy, or diagnostic laboratory.

ServiceCategoryCode.description: Alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies a service type

ServiceInformationResponseId.description: The service information response associated with the requested item.

ServicingFacilityId.description: The facility where a patient receives service of the requested item.

ServicingProviderId.description: The healthcare provider who provides the service of the requested item.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the request was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the request was sourced.

SourceSystemModified.description: Timestamp of the most recent update from the source system.

Status.description: The authorization status of this service.

StatusCodeId.description: The code of the action taken by the reviewer for the requested item.

StatusReason.description: Reason for the authorization status of this service.

SubmittedDateTime.description: The date and time when the item request was submitted.

TransactionNumber.description: The transaction number assigned to the request.
